document.full_text: two decades after his death, former president ferdinand e. marcos of the philippines is being formally considered for a burial with honors in a cemetery reserved for prominent figures.
document.title: batac journal: a hero?s burial for long-dead president marcos? it?s being considered
lines_and_colors: two decades after his death, former president ferdinand e. marcos of the philippines is being formally considered for a burial with honors in a cemetery reserved for prominent figures.
